titles.title: A bill to amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act to designate certain river segments within the Wood-Pawcatuck watershed as components of the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System, and for other purposes.
Wood-Pawcatuck Watershed Wild and Scenic River Act
Wood-Pawcatuck Watershed Wild and Scenic River Act
Wood-Pawcatuck Watershed Wild and Scenic River Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

term.name: Wilderness and natural areas, wildlife refuges, wild rivers, habitats

bill.summary:
Wood-Pawcatuck Watershed Wild and Scenic River Act
This bill designates specified river segments in the Wood-Pawcatuck watershed in Rhode Island and Connecticut as scenic, recreational, or wild rivers and as components of the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System.
